channel.title: Rune evo Character saves HELP!
channel.description: hi anyone know how to edit how the files are saved as they save as shitty .p files and i need to edit then easily not through having to input loads of boring commands etc any ideas?????

item.title: Rune evo Character saves HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Teem_Rocket, post:15, topic:525747”][quote author=Yourserver link=topic=644488.msg4336676#msg4336676 date=1374490683]

Ok, so I did some research, and the files are actually serialized java files. It allows the JVM to read and write files faster, I’d honestly suggest you leave the files the way they are written to maintain the efficiency of your server. What exactly are you trying to edit in the user files?

im trying to make it so that i can just look in the file and look at banks and add items easier and change all of the stats and spins and find passwords but without having to type in loads of commands…

EDIT::: okk i have tried to change the serializablefilemanager file but it comes back with errors in loads of different things and im not sure which to change…
[/quote]

You can write out commands for all of what you listed.[/quote]

ty for trying but i did state like 3 times that i cant be feking arsed to type commands in as it takes foreverrr!!!..

anyway i have the file if someone wants to have a try at getting it to save as a txt doc (not in serialized java file format)

Read full topic

item.title: Rune evo Character saves HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Yourserver, post:14, topic:525747”][quote author=Shorty626 link=topic=644488.msg4336448#msg4336448 date=1374449231]
Ok, so I did some research, and the files are actually serialized java files. It allows the JVM to read and write files faster, I’d honestly suggest you leave the files the way they are written to maintain the efficiency of your server. What exactly are you trying to edit in the user files?
[/quote]
im trying to make it so that i can just look in the file and look at banks and add items easier and change all of the stats and spins and find passwords but without having to type in loads of commands…

EDIT::: okk i have tried to change the serializablefilemanager file but it comes back with errors in loads of different things and im not sure which to change…[/quote]

You can write out commands for all of what you listed.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune evo Character saves HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

Shorty626:

Ok, so I did some research, and the files are actually serialized java files. It allows the JVM to read and write files faster, I’d honestly suggest you leave the files the way they are written to maintain the efficiency of your server. What exactly are you trying to edit in the user files?

im trying to make it so that i can just look in the file and look at banks and add items easier and change all of the stats and spins and find passwords but without having to type in loads of commands…

EDIT::: okk i have tried to change the serializablefilemanager file but it comes back with errors in loads of different things and im not sure which to change…

Read full topic

item.title: Rune evo Character saves HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

You can set Player rights according to names. You don’t need to edit character files if that’s what you’re after.

Read full topic
